Start you Rocket company HERE. Upload the craft files HERE.

Then make a list of the craft you've shared on the Rocket company, and when you have a new one:

1. Upload the craft.

2. Upload a couple of images for the craft page, make them good images which show the craft in nice, pleasing ways. I take my craft on a "Photo shoot" to get good pics. Try hyperediting it to Laythe orbit, and getting a picture of it with Jool rise. Add a note that they were taken with hyperedit, unless it's obvious.

3. Add a description, it doesn't need to be much, just a little description of what it does, how it works, and how to use it.
